title: Web Portfolio
summary:
Welcome to my portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects! This website serves as a testament to my proficiency in web development and design. Utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as React.js and Three.js, I've crafted an immersive experience where visitors can explore various facets of my expertise.
The structure of this website reflects my organized approach to development, with clear categorization of components and resources. From the captivating skybox backgrounds to the intricate island models, every detail has been meticulously crafted to engage and impress visitors.
Delve into the "Bubble Content" section to discover more about my background, education, work experience, and interests. Each island represents a different aspect of my journey and skills, providing a unique and interactive way to navigate through my portfolio.
The seamless integration of libraries like GSAP and Jotai enhances the user experience, ensuring smooth animations and state management. Whether you're a recruiter, potential client, or fellow developer, I invite you to explore my portfolio and get to know more about my capabilities and passions.
Skills:
React.js, Three.js, Web Development, Frontend Development, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Responsive Design, Git, GSAP (GreenSock Animation Platform), Jotai, User Experience (UX) Design, State Management, Component-Based Architecture, Software Development, Problem Solving, Team Collaboration, Agile Methodologies, Debugging, Creative Thinking

title: AI CCTV Detector
summary: Created software to load live CCTV camera feeds and apply AI models for object detection, anomaly detection, and real-time analytics.

title: AI Trading Bot
summary: Designed an AI-driven trading bot capable of making real-time trade decisions based on market trends and predictive analytics.

summary: Built multiple Grafana monitoring dashboards to track key performance metrics for company systems.

summary: Created a visualization and clustering tool to categorize and sort large image datasets based on AI-driven similarity analysis.

title: Algorithm-Based Trading Bot
summary: Developed a trading bot for Stocks, Crypto, and CFDs using Python and PineScript. Implemented algorithmic strategies to automate trade execution and optimize profit margins.

summary: Co-developed a website that scrapes and aggregates discounted games from major online stores, categorizing and displaying them efficiently.

title: Chess Game (A-Level Project)

title: Transparent Solar Cells (Ongoing)
summary: Researching and developing transparent perovskite solar cells with a focus on energy efficiency and material optimization.

title: Audio Amplifier
summary: Designed and developed an audio amplifier with volume control, LCD display for audio amplitude, and mono/stereo mode switching.

title: FM Radio
summary: Built an FM radio with additional features such as temperature and proximity sensors, LCD display, and remote control functionality.

title: Capacitance Adapter for Multimeter
summary: Created an adapter to enhance multimeter capacitance measurement accuracy by converting high-frequency signals.

summary: Designed and developed this portfolio website using Next.js and TailwindCSS, ensuring responsiveness and modern UI design.
